tool_description:
Simple to use temperature conversion API. Select the different endpoints or the general one. Give in your from, to, value and decimal amount and the API will convert your value. Create now your own temperature converter with just an API call 
For a more advanced Documentation go to https://congen-online.com/
name: Temperature Converter
title: Temperature Converter

api_list.name: Convert Celsius
api_list.description: Convert Celsius to any other temperature scale unit.

required_parameters.name: decimal
required_parameters.description: A value between 0 and 100 to specify the amount of decimal places you want.

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Specify the amount you want to convert. Must be a Integer or a Float.

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: Specify the value to convert TO. Options are 'Fahrenheit, F, Kelvin, K, Rankine, Ra, Newton, N, Delisle, De, Reaumur, Re, Romer, Ro, All'. Conversions are only possible to an different value than the FROM value.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://congen-temperature-converter-v1.p.rapidapi.com/celsius?to=all&value=40&decimal=2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "congen-temperature-converter-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://congen-temperature-converter-v1.p.rapidapi.com/celsius?to={to}&value={value}&decimal={decimal}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "congen-temperature-converter-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert From
api_list.description: Convert temperature from one to another value

required_parameters.name: decimal
required_parameters.description: A value between 0 and 100 to specify the amount of decimal places you want.

required_parameters.name: from
required_parameters.description: Specify the value to convert FROM. Options are 'Celsius, C, Fahrenheit, F, Kelvin, K, Rankine, Ra, Newton, N, Delisle, De, Reaumur, Re, Romer, Ro'.

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Specify the amount you want to convert. Must be a Integer or a Float.

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: Specify the value to convert TO. Options are 'Celsius, C, Fahrenheit, F, Kelvin, K, Rankine, Ra, Newton, N, Delisle, De, Reaumur, Re, Romer, Ro'. Conversions are only possible to an different value than the FROM value.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://congen-temperature-converter-v1.p.rapidapi.com/convert?from=celsius&to=fahrenheit&value=40&decimal=2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "congen-temperature-converter-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
